pdf_options.headerTemplate: L'IA Pero - Rapport RNCP40875 Bloc 2 - Adam Beloucif & Amina Medjdoub
pdf_options.footerTemplate: Page /

css: body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 1.4; color: #000; } h1 { font-size: 16pt; color: #1a5276; border-bottom: 2px solid #1a5276; padding-bottom: 5px; margin-top: 15px; margin-bottom: 10px; page-break-after: avoid; } h2 { font-size: 13pt; color: #2874a6; margin-top: 12px; margin-bottom: 8px; page-break-after: avoid; } h3 { font-size: 11pt; color: #3498db; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: avoid; } p { margin: 6px 0; } table { border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; margin: 8px 0; font-size: 9pt; page-break-inside: avoid; } th, td { border: 1px solid #333; padding: 6px 8px; text-align: left; } th { background-color: #1a5276; color: white; font-size: 9pt; font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f0f0f0; } td { color: #000; } code { background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 2px 5px; border-radius: 3px; font-size: 9pt; color: #333; border: 1px solid #ddd; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Courier New', monospace; } pre { background-color: #f8f8f8; color: #333; padding: 12px; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 9pt; line-height: 1.4; overflow-x: auto; page-break-inside: avoid; margin: 10px 0; border: 1px solid #ccc; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Courier New', monospace; } pre code { background: none; border: none; padding: 0; font-size: 9pt; color: #333; } strong { color: #1a5276; } ul, ol { margin: 6px 0; padding-left: 20px; } li { margin: 3px 0; } img { max-width: 250px; display: block; margin: 15px auto; } hr { margin: 10px 0; border: none; border-top: 1px solid #ddd; } blockquote { background-color: #f9f9f9; border-left: 4px solid #1a5276; padding: 10px 15px; margin: 10px 0; color: #333; }
